name: Republic inc.
description:
Become president and lead your country to greatness. Develop the economy, set taxes, invest in education and security. Issue bonds, launch mega-projects, negotiate nation-wide contracts with corporations. Change the law to make your citizens love you, or to milk them out of money or to squeeze your own ideology.

There are hundreds of events available in the game: from invasions of neighbors, to an outbreak of Australian toad rash virus that accidentally spread to humans, from terrorist attacks to massive state development programs.

Collect tax money and transfer it to 8 key areas: army, security, education, innovation, business, social programs, public debt, etc. You can build your party's support by investing in the areas citizens expect.

You can build factories, connect them along delivery routes, and sell products.

Win elections to extend your rule and become the emperor of your republic.

You can also play simplified edition of the game, just download Republic inc. Story.
